scripts.start: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; npm run db:init; npm run db:backup:personal; trap "npm run db:backup:personal" EXIT; node dist/server.js'
scripts.dev: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; npm run db:init; npm run db:backup:personal; trap "npm run db:backup:personal" EXIT; nodemon --exec ts-node server.ts'
scripts.dev:watch: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; npm run db:init; npm run db:backup:personal; trap "npm run db:backup:personal" EXIT; nodemon --exec ts-node --watch src server.ts'
